oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of homeopathic remedies for the treatment of calves with diarrhea
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Boldyreva, E. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: homeopathic remedies
gastrointestinal disorders
diarrhea
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An experiment conducted to evaluate of the use of homeopathic remedies for the treatment of calves with gastrointestinal disorders (diarrhea) was performed on each of two large farms in the Moscow region of Russia. On one farm, complex homeopathic remedies produced by the German company Biologische Heilmittel Heel GmbH were used, and on the other farm, single homeopathic remedies produced by a local company were used.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2012; 223
